overview: Think of this as "Austin Powers:Episode One" A nine minute spoof of Notting hill and Austin Powers. Set six years before the events of the original Austin Powers. Mr. Evil, younger, not yet a Doctor, and not yet the Evil world dominator that we now know, runs a small childrens bookshop somewhere near Bavaria. It is the story of how Dr. Evil became Evil, and his unlikely and doomed love affair with the biggest movie star in the world.
tagline: Every EVIL saga has a beginning
title: Evil Hill
